archeologyp1.shared

Class Utilities

  • java.lang.Object
    • archeologyp1.shared.Utilities

  • public class Utilities
extends java.lang.Object
    UTILITIES IN THE SHARED RESOURCES Holds a number of utilities used by both projects.
    Author:
    Daniel, Celine This class contains utilities that are shared by both the MPT and the ADT. Included in this class are the methods that generates the map, loads the file that will generate the map, save the file, and print the map.
